name: Story of the Green Dragon
description:
Fight against evil corporation in this arcade Beat 'Em Up game, in the streets of Hong Kong...

Dee is a distinguished martial artist recruited by a British intelligence agency takes part in a fierce fight against mysterious Cannabis drugs lord Taito, who is also responsible for Dee's fathers death. Together with agent Alice they discover the drug lair situated at an urban city and defeats Taito's gangs in a brutal battle.
